message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000. This is a great deal, considering its value to me is at least $15000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I think $18000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $15000 for it. Can you consider my offer?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not willing to sell it to you for $15000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $16500. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering its value to me is at least $15000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $16000 for the product. Can you consider my offer?

I understand that you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $16250. This is the best price I can offer, considering its value to me is at least $15000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $15500 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
